# File lib/som_skin.rb, line 28
    def body
      output = "<tr>"
      columns.each {|item| output += "<th class='text-heading'>#{item[0]}</th>" }
      output += "</tr>"
      (0...collection.size).to_a.each do |i|
        output += "<tr>"
        output += (columns.collect {|item| item[1][i] }).join("\n")
        output += "</tr>"
      end
      return output
    end
